body:
Comment 1 by **mikio.hr**: 
I tried both rev-9ab68eb94762 and rev-1e800f6ac9dc on freebsd/386 and got build error
rev-1e800f6ac9dc branch only.

-- build log --
rm -f _obj/rpc/jsonrpc.a
gopack grc _obj/rpc/jsonrpc.a _go_.8 
cgo -dynimport _cgo1_.o >__cgo_import.c && mv -f __cgo_import.c _cgo_import.c
throw: runtime: cannot reserve memory bitmap virtual address spacecp _obj/rpc/jsonrpc.a
"/home/mikioh/x2/pkg/freebsd_386/rpc/jsonrpc.a"


gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/home/mikioh/x2/src/pkg/rpc/jsonrpc'
cp -f goinstall /home/mikioh/x2/bin
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/home/mikioh/x2/src/cmd/goinstall'
cp -f godoc /home/mikioh/x2/bin
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/home/mikioh/x2/src/cmd/godoc'
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
gmake[1]: *** [_cgo_import.c] Error 139

gmake: *** [runtime/cgo.install] Error 2
